generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Block Components Redstone Producer
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: The definitions for how a block can produce a redstone signal.

fields.title: Connected Faces
fields.description:
The list of faces that are considered connected to the circuit. If a face is not connected, it will not provide power to the block touching that face.
By default, all faces are connected.

fields.title: Power
fields.description: The strength of the redstone signal produced by this block. 0 means no signal and higher numbers mean stronger signal.

fields.title: Facing
fields.description:
The block touching this face will become strongly powered with the signal level strength of "power".
Strongly powered blocks will power adjacent blocks.
By default, the block will not strongly power any face.

fields.title: Transform Relative
fields.description: If true, the "strongly_powered_face" and "connected_faces" properties will be rotated according to the "minecraft:transformation" component.
